_header: Of Saint Andrew now follows next
Subjects: Andrew, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Andrew in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
off sanct Andrew now folouys nextþat bar þe mekest hart
                    in breste…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þat ay sal leste but eny endto þe quhilk blyse he
                    vs al send
